channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft .NET Framework
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft .NET Framework

item.title: CVE-2017-0248|2024-08-05T12:55:19.143Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20.net%20framework
item.description: Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0, 3.5, 3.5.1, 4.5.2, 4.6, 4.6.1, 4.6.2 and 4.7 allow an attacker to bypass Enhanced Security Usage taggings when they present a certificate that is invalid for a specific use, aka ".NET Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability."
